description: Once you try these gourmet sausage subs loaded with kale slaw and chilli pineapple salsa, you'll never go back to a regular sub.
name: Loaded Sausage Subs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g frozen Woolworths Australian steakhouse chips
600 g Woolworths beef herb & garlic sausages

recipeInstructions.text: Fill rolls with slaw, sausages and pineapple salsa. Serve with chips.
